name: The Western Hunter
description: The Western Hunter is a immersive fast-paced first person shooting VR game only for HTC Vive. With in the game, you are able to hunt down different animals in the western wilds.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIN7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: WIN7 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
